Text:
Would be really nice if you didn't include a plot description in the torrent description lol. Quite a bit of spoilers there.. whoever wrote that is a moron.

Good torrent! Great quality. Please also include the bitrate though mate. It's important for those who watch from their USB stick and stuff. I might have the worlds fastest USB 2.0 stick (Patriot Xporter 16GB) but it can only handle so much...

So please include the bitrate in the description.

So far characters are yeah really clichĂÂŠ it's very much a 'family' show intended for kids as well. Though namely a few scenes would scare the shit out of children.

Also finding it really predictable but it's not completely cringe worthy. I'm waiting for a bit more action and some maturity from the cast of actors. If it gets worse than this however I'll stop watching it and move on to something else.

Torrent has no subs. You can get them online though. I personally don't think you need subs to watch this. Watched the first 5 episodes without subs no problem at all. Only wish they would hurry up and air the series faster.

This is episode 5. Episode 6 isn't until November 7th.

It depends on how you count them... 2 is in fact 3...

That's why sometimes the description is needed... despite some "spoilers"...

This is 6 look it up if you want 1 and 2 was a launch episode. No spoilers just a good description. But can someone please tell me what happened? America use to be a episode ahead of Europe but now it seems we are on the same schedule??? I was waiting for this episode last week. Would love it if someone actually reply'd to this
